bill.summary:
Recognizes the Cumbres & Toltec Scenic Railroad (C&TSRR) days.
Acknowledges the critical role of freight and passenger rail in our nation's intermodal transportation system.
Commends efforts of the state governments of Colorado and New Mexico, the C&TSRR Commission, the C&TSRR Management Company, and Friends of the C&TSRR for their efforts to maintain this historic and scenic railroad.
